title: Hellboy - Asylum Seeker
description:
Hellboy - Asylum Seeker

Will Hellboy manage to stop this terrible prophecy? His quest will lead him
into the most terrifying of places and force him to defy the laws of time,
and you will be there, every step of the way.

Based on the Dark Horse Comics drawn by Mike Mignola, Hellboy has a
mysterious and unnerving atmosphere somewhere between Edgar Allan Poe in his
most sombre hours and H.P. Lovecraft in his most terrifying moments.

The game alternates between traps, puzzles and combat sequences where thought
is just as important as reflexes and dexterity. Hellboy is a 3D-real time
action game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
